title: Eastern Valles Marineris Bedrock Stratigraphy and Falling Dunes
description: This image shows a transect of approximately 8-kilometers of Coprates Chasma wall stratigraphy, which includes (moving down sequence): the southern plateau, wall spurs, fans of eroded material, gullies, sand dunes, and canyon floor.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
